alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 10:16AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sunflower and northeastern Bolivar Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1016 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shelby, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Winstonville around 1020 AM CDT. Mound Bayou and Merigold around 1025 AM CDT. Drew around 1045 AM CDT. Parchman and Rome around 1050 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
